alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 9:36PM CDT until June 04 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Dawson County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 936 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elm Creek, or 16 miles northwest of Kearney, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Amherst around 945 PM CDT. Elm Creek around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Odessa and Riverdale. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 254 and 262. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
